name: The Renaissance Chateau in Burgundy
description:
DESCRIPTION
Enhance your wedding day at this beautiful 15th Century Château, a Renaissance gem and 4-star prestige hotel. The castle is ideally located 2 hours from Paris or Lyon surrounded by nature in a picturesque department in the heart of Burgundy. Recognized as a historic monument and a pilot site for sustainable development in the region, you can enjoy a dream weekend in this castle.
In the park of the Château, you can organize your secular ceremony. For your cocktail reception, a courtyard will be at your disposal. Finally, a charming reception room will allow you to welcome your guests for your meal and your evening.
For the weekend of your wedding, the site will be fully privatized. You will have access to the large event hall from Friday evening in order to set up your bridal scenography.
The rental price includes:
The whole castle for 2 days / 1 night
4 hectares of green space
Equipment (tables and chairs for 200 people maximum, additional furniture)
Wine of honor - installation of furniture
Car park
One of our luxury rooms for the bride and groom
The Château team will be able to support you throughout your preparations for your big day. They take care, on request, of the complete or partial organization of the event at competitive rates and offer you wedding planner and tailor-made decoration services, with an exclusive design specially developed for your event according to your desires.
If you have particular dreams, they are at your disposal to realise them by letting you savor time in our area full of history and charm. They provide you with logistical support and share with you the network of their partner providers for the organization of each stage of your event.
Their in-house catering service is available for groups of up to 100-125 people. The chefs draw up individual menus for you according to your wishes and preferences. For larger groups, they offer you their proven catering partners, with whom they have collaborated for several years.
After your festivities, 40 guests can stay on site and enjoy a night's rest in one of the 16 exceptionally designed rooms. You can find them the next day for brunch by the pool.
Each room at the Château is decorated in its unique style representing different eras and its particular decorative spirit. Each object in the rooms has a story that is shared with the hosts with elegance and distinction.
These professionals offer you a unique all-inclusive wedding service, tailored to your budget and preferences. Contact them for an individual offer.
additional_info:
FEATURES
Disabled access
Pet friendly
Maid service
Swimming pool
Hotel recommendation list
Recommended wedding planner
Breakfast included
Nearest Airport
Recommended caterer
Recommended suppliers list available
Baby friendly (cots, changing facilities)
Internet access
